purple-day_one-default.text: Pink â€“ have you talked with the others yet?
purple-day_one-default.speaker: purple

purple-day_one-default.text: Listen to them speak: they will not say it. They will not utter its name, our rocky interloper
purple-day_one-default.speaker: purple

purple-day_one-default.text: They are afraid, all of them. But you must have no fear
purple-day_one-default.speaker: purple

meeting_day_one-yes.text: (You have decided to sacrifice innocent lives to try to stop the moon)
meeting_day_one-yes.speaker: purple

meeting_day_one-no.text: (You have decided to not sacrifice innocent lives)
meeting_day_one-no.speaker: purple

meeting_day_two-yes.text: (It is now day two. Yesterday you decided to sacrifice innocent lives)
meeting_day_two-yes.speaker: purple

meeting_day_two-no.text: (It is now day two. Yesterday you decided to not sacrifice innocent lives)
meeting_day_two-no.speaker: purple

meeting_day_three-x-yes.text: (It is now day three. Yesterday you decided to launch a nuclear warhead at the moon)
meeting_day_three-x-yes.speaker: purple

meeting_day_three-x-no.text: (It is now day three. Yesterday you decided to not launch a nuclear warhead at the moon)
meeting_day_three-x-no.speaker: purple
